text:
Daniel Davisse (born Daniel Herz; 7 July 1938 – 29 March 2020) was a German-born French politician. He was born in Hamburg, Germany to French parents. From 1996 to 2014, he was Mayor of Choisy-le-Roi, France. Davisse was a member of the General council of Canton of Choisy-le-Roi from 2004 to 2011. He was also President of the Agglomeration community Seine Amont from 2013 to 2014.
Davisse died on 29 March 2020 of COVID-19, aged 81.
